provider.selectSQL: SELECT r.sheetNumber, r.fuelId, f.fuelName, SUM(r.quantity) AS quantity FROM waybillsRefuelling r INNER JOIN fuel f ON f.fuelId = r.fuelId WHERE r.sheetNumber = 0{_sheet} GROUP BY r.sheetNumber, r.fuelId, f.fuelName

UPDATE waybillsRefuellingSheets SET sheetState = 1 WHERE sheetNumber = 0{_sheet};
INSERT INTO otherRefuellingSheets (fuelId, groupAccId) SELECT fuelId, groupAccId FROM otherRefuellingSheets WHERE oSheetNumber = 0{_sheet};
